data.title: Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne
data.meta_description: Eindhoven is alive – creativity is everywhere in the vibrant City of Light – in the areas of innovation, technology and design. Eindhoven is rightly...
data.text:
Eindhoven is alive – creativity is everywhere in the vibrant City of Light – in the areas of innovation, technology and design. Eindhoven is rightly one of the recognized main ports of the Netherlands; Brainport Region Eindhoven. It is also home to the world famous multinationals ASML and Philips. The 4-star Superior hotel Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne is located in the center, an ideal base for business and relaxation.

The hotel’s excellent location, within walking distance of Eindhoven Central Station and opposite De Heuvel, a luxury shopping center, is just one of the many reasons why guests choose to stay at this hotel. Experience the atmosphere in the trendy Strijp-S district – creativity combines perfectly with design. Curious about the most intelligent m² in the world? Visit the High Tech Campus. Or discover mobility innovations on the Automotive Campus. Experience design at the Van Abbe Museum, various Street Art spots or get inspiration from Piet Hein Eek. For a beautiful cultural experience, visit the Philips museum, DAF museum, the PreHistoric Village, the Genneper Watermill or Van Gogh Village in Nuenen.

The name Cocagne calls to mind the land of Cockaigne which was rumoured to be a paradise or the land of plenty. The hotelname leads to suspect that guests do not have to worry about a thing. That is true. The ambiance of Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne is both comfortable and stimulating. Design is stylish and contemporary furnishings provide utmost comfort and service is efficiently impeccable.

Restaurant and bar Vestdijk47 entice travellers with flavours from around the world. The Fit and Spa lounge provides a haven of zen. At Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne, you will find outstanding business facilities and 18 venues for meetings, events and congresses.

APARTMENTS & STUDIO’S

Do you know that the Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne also has a large apartment and studio for guests who want to stay in Eindhoven for a longer period of time?

Apartments

Experience the luxury and comfort of your own apartment in the center of Eindhoven. Your own place in a prime location, while you benefit from all the services and services of a luxury hotel. The spacious apartments are stylishly furnished and have a fully equipped open kitchen. The apartment has a separate bathroom with shower/bath, bedroom with 2 single beds, a work area, a spacious living room with a dining area. Each apartment has a washing machine, dryer, iron and ironing board.

Studios

The studios with an area of approximately 40m2 are fully furnished and have an open kitchen. There is also a spacious living, sleeping and dining area and a separate bathroom with bath and shower. Guests can use the hotel’s laundry facilities, iron and ironing board are provided in the studio.

The studios and apartments can only be booked via reservations with a minimum stay of 7 consecutive nights. Breakfast is not included because guests have a kitchen, but the use of our car park is included.

For the most comfortable hotel rooms, suites and apartments in Eindhoven, travellers do not need to look any further than Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne, a 4-star Premium hotel.
